lines.text: peso = long long , long long map
lines.code: map < long long , long long > peso ;

lines.text: t , u , v , w = long long
lines.code: long long t , u , v , w ;

lines.text: read t then u then v
loop while u is not v
increment peso [ max of u , v ] by w
loop while u is not v
if peso contains max of u , v increment ans by peso [ max of u , v ]
lines.code: if ( peso . count ( max ( u , v ) ) ) ans += peso [ max ( u , v ) ] ;

mod_code: if ( peso . substr ( u , v ) ) { ans += peso [ max ( u , v ] ) ; }

wrong number of template arguments (1, should be at least 2)
expected ‘]’ before ‘)’ token
expected ‘while’ before ‘}’ token
